bib.title: Relational Classification Using Random Walks in Graphs
bib.author: Kajdanowicz, Tomasz
bib.abstract: A novel approach to relational classification based on a Gaussian Random Field and random walks over the graph representing labeled and unlabeled examples is proposed in the paper. Additionally, a class homogeneity measure has been introduced. It can be used for pre-assessment of method applicability for particular networks. The presented experimental results on eight datasets revealed that the framework based on random walk concept possesses the promising potential to effectively classify nodes in the network
